headline: Evolving Digital Marketing Demands to Offer Support to Omnicom (OMC)
summary: Omnicom Group (NYSE:OMC) is one of the best communication services stocks according to Hedge Funds. On December 16, Thomas Yeh of Morgan Stanley initiated coverage of Omnicom Group (NYSE:OMC) with an Equal Weight rating. Yeh cited the company’s post-deal integration risks related to their merger with IPG as the basis for his cautious rating. He […]
